entry.title: Hello Hexo
entry.content:
This is the first blog in my life! And, yes, give my “virginity” to hexo! I really donot know how long I can keep doing this, but I ll try for sure.

After automatic “hello world” post, I have try to understand the hexo, and here is the thing:

New Post

hexo new [layout] postName

then the new post can be edited at ./source/_posts/postName.md
entry.summary:
This is the first blog in my life! And, yes, give my “virginity” to hexo! I really donot know how long I can keep doing this, but I ll try for sure.

After automatic “hello world” post, I have try to understand the hexo, and here is the thing:

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
entry.summary: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check
